company_name: Institute of Applied Health Sciences Hospital(IAHS-H) USTC Complex, Foy’ Lake, Khulshi, Chattogram
job_description: Assistant Director : Institute of Applied Health Sciences Hospital(IAHS-H) USTC Complex, Foy’ Lake, Khulshi, Chattogram Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Institute of Applied Health Sciences Hospital(IAHS-H) USTC Complex, Foy’ Lake, Khulshi, Chattogram Assistant Director Application Deadline : 14 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Experience: 5 to 6 years Published: 12 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Master Degree/MBA from recognised university. The incumbent must have at least 5-6 years of experience in HealthCare Industry. Experience 5 to 6 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Hospital Additional Requirements Good managerial and organizational skills, as well as excellent medical knowledge and training, Responsibilities & Context Applications are invited from energetic, self-motivated and experienced candidates for the position of Assistant Director, IAHS-H on the prevailing terms and conditions. Job Responsibilities Supporting the Hospital Director/Dy Director in ensuring smooth day-to-day operations of the hospital. Assisting in planning, organizing, and directing overall hospital operations to achieve strategic and operational objectives. Contributing to the development, implementation, and review of hospital policies, procedures, and protocols. Monitoring and evaluating hospital performance metrics (e.g., patient flow, efficiency, costs). Facilitating effective cross-departmental coordination to optimize patient care and resource utilization. Assistng in resolving interdepartmental issues and promoting a collaborative work environment. Serving as a liaison between hospital leadership and external stakeholders, including government agencies, vendors, and partners. Supporting recruitment, onboarding, training, and performance evaluation of hospital staff in coordination with HR department. Assisting in budgeting, financial planning, and cost control initiatives. Ensuring compliance with healthcare regulations, safety standards, and accreditation requirements. Participating in quality improvement programs, audits, and performance reviews. Monitoring infection control practices and patient safety initiatives to maintain high standards of care. Contributing to short-term and long-term strategic planning of hospital services and infrastructure. Monitoring patient feedback and satisfaction levels to identify areas for improvement. Working closely with clinical teams to address and resolve patient concerns. Promoting and upholding a culture of patient-centered care and service excellence. Executing any other duties assigned by the authority. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Chattogram Read Before Apply Application in plain paper al

job_title: Data Analytics and Digital Transformation Lead
job_description: Data Analytics and Digital Transformation Lead : Emami Bangladesh Ltd. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Emami Bangladesh Ltd. Data Analytics and Digital Transformation Lead Application Deadline : 20 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 8 years Published: 11 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Experience At least 8 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Manufacturing (FMCG), Multinational Companies, Cosmetics/Toiletries/Personal Care Responsibilities & Context Ensure seamless integration with existing systems. Develop predictive models and dashboards for forecasting, pipeline management, and performance tracking. Implement advanced analytics tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, SQL, Python) to support decision-making. Design and execute transformation strategies to modernize processes, tools, and methodologies. Assess current automation systems and AI adoption in sales operations for efficiency and scalability. Collaborate with marketing, finance, and operations to align analytics and transformation initiatives with business objectives. Provide actionable insights to leadership for strategic decision-making. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices in current processes. Develop training programs and communication plans to ensure smooth adoption of new processes and tools. Skills & Expertise Data analysis Transformational Leadership Data Visualization Innovative Strategic Decision Making Compensation & Other Benefits Annual CTC BDT 13-15 Lac Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Emami Bangladesh Ltd. Follow Address: Emami Bangladesh Ltd, Aqua Tower (Level-6), 43, Mohakhali C/A, Dhaka-1212, Bangladesh. Business: Emami Bangladesh ltd. is one of the leading personal & health care manufacturing company with an enviable portfolio of household name such as Navratna, Fair & Handsome, Boro plus & so on. job_description: Appointment Setter (Remote) | Lead Generation | US Market : Lumero Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Lumero Appointment Setter (Remote) | Lead Generation | US Market Application Deadline : 11 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 18 to 40 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Tk. 16500 (Monthly) Experience: At least 1 year Published: 11 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education A Level in English Sales Training (Cold Calling / Appointment Setting) English Language (Speaking / Listening) Experience At least 1 year The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Business-to-Business (B2B) Software and Services Startup, Direct Selling/Marketing Service Company Additional Requirements Age 18 to 40 years Responsibilities & Context Please NOTE: Clear, neutral English accent preferred. We are an Artificial Intelligence consultancy selling AI-powered solutions to small and mid-sized businesses in the US and UK. Our offers include AI agents (customer support and sales), business automations, AI chatbots, lead capture systems, integrations, and modern websites when needed. Your role is to source prospects, cold call decision makers, and book qualified appointments for our closers. Job Responsibilities • Build your own daily lead list using Google Maps and other online directories • Identify businesses with weak online presence or operational gaps (no website, outdated website, no booking system, missed calls, slow follow-up, manual admin, no lead tracking) • Collect accurate contact details where possible (owner/manager name, phone, email, location) • Cold call business owners and managers and use a short script to start conversations • Qualify prospects quickly (need, decision maker, urgency, and basic budget fit) • Book qualified appointments on our calendar for a demo or strategy call • Keep clean notes and update the CRM or Google Sheet after every call • Follow up to confirm appointments and reduce no-shows (calls and messages) • Hit daily activity and performance targets (leads built, dials, bookings, and show-up rate) This vacancy is for English-speaking candidates only. Stable internet for VoIP: 20 Mbps down / 10 Mbps up, wired connection preferred. Skills & Expertise Cold Calling Sales Sales & Marketing Sales Executive B2B Sales Appointment Setting lead generation Google Maps Customer Handling Fluent in English Speaking Compensation & Other Benefits Bonus: 300 BDT per qualified appointment booked Workplace Work from home Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Job Highlights Please NOTE: Clear, neutral English accent preferred. job_description: Senior Admission Executive : University of Science and Technology Chittagong (USTC) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List University of Science and Technology Chittagong (USTC) Senior Admission Executive Application Deadline : 13 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 5 years Published: 11 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education MBA/Masters in any discipline Experience At least 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): University Additional Requirements Strong communication skills in English and Bangla (oral and written). Pleasant personality, honest, hardworking. Ability to work well under strict deadlines. Proficiency in MS Office. Responsibilities & Context The Admissions Office serves as the office, responsible for leading, planning, and managing all student admissions and enrolment activities. The role ensures that admissions strategies align with the university’s vision, mission, academic priorities, financial sustainability goals, and regulatory requirements. Talented, Energetic, Self-motivated and Experienced candidates are invited to apply for the position of Senior Admission Executive, USTC under the prevailing terms and conditions of USTC. Job Responsibilities To assist the Director,  Admissions Office in planning and executing the University’s admissions strategy to achieve enrolment targets. To manage the end-to-end admissions process, including: application receipt and verification, eligibility assessment, coordination of entrance tests and interviews, and enrolment confirmation. To ensure all admissions activities comply with accreditation requirements, UGC and other regulatory requirements and University policies. To maintain accurate and secure records of applicants. To provide accurate information and guidance to prospective students and parents regarding programs, admission criteria, scholarships, and enrolment procedures. To coordinate with the authority and academic departments to verify eligibility, seat availability, and program-specific requirements. To support the preparation and timely publication of admission schedules, brochures, prospectuses, and website content. To assist in organising and participating in admission campaigns, admission fairs and promotional events. To build and maintain relationships with feeder institutions, educational counselors and recruitment partners. To ensure transparent, fair, and merit-based handling of applications in accordance with institutional policies. To monitor daily admission statistics and prepare regular reports on application trends and enrolment status. To handle admission-related student matters including re-admission, repeat cases, cancellation, migration and record updates as per Univers

Application Deadline : 21 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 26 to 40 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 11 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 26 to 40 years Preference will be given to candidates who bring solid experience in Ready Mix Concrete sales, and such applicants are highly encouraged to apply. Responsibilities & Context If you`re looking for a role where you can continue to make an impression, take the next step at Bashundhara Ready Mix & Construction Industries Limited where your contributions will always be valued. We are currently seeking an ambitious individual to join this team in the role of Executive/Sr. Executive (Sales) for Bashundhara Ready Mix & Construction Industries Ltd. Job Responsibilities: Achieve monthly, quarterly, and yearly sales targets for ready-mix concrete through effective team coordination and performance management. Identify, pursue, and secure new business opportunities in the construction and infrastructure sector for ready-mix concrete. Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, contractors, developers, engineers, and project managers. Understand client requirements and provide appropriate support and solutions. Conduct regular site visits, client meetings, and follow-up on leads and inquiries. Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and pricing to identify growth opportunities. Collaborate with production, logistics, and technical teams to ensure timely delivery and customer satisfaction. Maintain accurate records of sales activities and customer interactions, queries and solutions. Perform other duties as assigned by management. Skills & Expertise Communication Convincing people Energetic and self-motivated leadership and negotiation MSOffice applications Sales Target Achievement Teamwork Time Management Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill,T/A,Gratuity Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Sales incentives others as per company policy Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 35 years Responsibilities & Context 🔎 Job Overview Property Search BD is looking for a smart, presentable, and target-driven Female Executive – Sales & Marketing who will primarily handle tele-sales, client communication, and desk-based sales operations . The ideal candidate should have strong communication skills, be comfortable speaking with clients over the phone, and be capable of converting leads into successful property sales. ✅ Key Responsibilities Tele-Sales & Client Handling Conduct outbound calls to potential buyers from provided databases and generated leads. Respond to inbound inquiries and effectively explain property features, pricing, and benefits. Qualify leads, understand customer requirements, and schedule property presentations or site visits for the sales team. Perform regular follow-ups to nurture prospects and convert them into buyers. Maintain a professional and persuasive tone in all client communications. Sales & Marketing Support Generate and follow up on qualified sales leads for residential and commercial properties through digital channels, referrals, and networking. Conduct market research on new and upcoming properties to identify pricing trends, buyer demand, and opportunities. Promote real estate projects through phone calls, online platforms, and marketing campaigns. Assist in executing sales strategies to achieve monthly and quarterly targets. Client Relationship Management Build and maintain long-term relationships with buyers, investors, and channel partners. Maintain an organized and updated client database and track interactions using CRM or reporting tools. Provide excellent customer service and support throughout the sales process and after-sales when required. Coordination & Reporting Coordinate with internal teams (legal, documentation, and accounts) to ensure smooth transaction completion. Prepare daily and weekly sales reports, lead status updates, and performance summaries. Analyze customer feedback and buyer preferences to improve engagement and sales outcomes. 🎯 Requirements Female candidates only. Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (preferred). 1–3 years of experience in tele-sales, sales, marketing, or customer service (real estate experience is a plus).
